text: Ending my life just before  Kinda lengthy so if you read this post  thank you About   months ago  I was at the lowest point of my life  The only working vehicle we had got repo d  I was living in a crowded trailer that felt more like a crack house  my dad was blowing his money on drugs leaving us with little to no money for food rent bills  I ve had depression for years but it s gotten more severe about   years ago  One of my  friends  talked me out of ending it then  but I didn t tell them that if my life didn t get better by the end of the year I was gonna kill myself   As I m writing this  I m stuck moving between temporary homes because we were kicked out due to my dad not paying rent for   months but still having enough money to buy drugs  I m stuck in a job with weird hours that can get pretty demanding for the pay  and I can t take any time off because I need the money  Due to my work  I distanced myself and I ve lost contact with nearly all of my friends  They all found better things to do and better people to be around  They don t want to be associated with someone who s suicidal  My family is full of narcissists that attack me for defending myself or if I do something they slightly disagree on   The only reason I can remember staying this long for was to play the new super smash brothers game that just released  and now that it s done  it s time for me to leave  It s pretty stupid  I know  I kept trying  and waiting  and hoping that eventually life would be better but it s gotten worse  I can t take being alone anymore  I can t take being stressed out anymore  I can t take being unloved anymore  If the people who I love don t want to be with me  then I think it s time I leave  and never come back
